creator: Bistrot Pierre
descriptionHtml:
Bistrot Pierre is a group of independent French restaurants, located all across the UK, offering great-value freshly prepared bistrot cooking.

Club Bistrot Pierre is our loyalty scheme and this app allows you to collect points every time you dine with us, which in turn can be redeemed against a whole host of rewards, such as complimentary meals and wine. You’ll also get access to exclusive members offers too. You can also use it to easily view our menus, find your local bistrot and book a table.

Features of the App
- Register for a Club Bistrot Pierre account.
- Collect points and redeem rewards when you visit our bistrots.
- Quickly and easily view your points balance in real time and what rewards you have earned.
- View all of our menus
- Easily find your nearest bistrot, with directions and their contact details
- Make an online booking and leave customer feedback.
descriptionShort: The Bistrot Pierre app is part of our loyalty scheme ‘Club Bistrot Pierre’

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Fixes an issue where certain offers wouldn't display in "My Exclusive Offers".

title: Club Bistrot Pierre

creator: Bistrot Pierre
descriptionHtml:
Bistrot Pierre is a group of independent French restaurants, located all across the UK, offering great-value freshly prepared bistrot cooking.

Club Bistrot Pierre is our loyalty scheme and this app allows you to collect points every time you dine with us, which in turn can be redeemed against a whole host of rewards, such as complimentary meals and wine. You’ll also get access to exclusive members offers too. You can also use it to easily view our menus, find your local bistrot and book a table.

Features of the App
- Automatically join Club Bistrot Pierre
- Collect points on every order and Redeem Rewards at any Bistrot Pierre restaurant
- See your points balance in real time as well as all your available rewards
- View our menus
- Easily find your nearest Bistrot Pierre restaurant, get directions or tap on the number to call
- Book your table or event
descriptionShort: Download the Bistrot Pierre app to earn points and enjoy special offers!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New design, new colours and new loyalty scheme.
